---
aliases:
  - Checkboard puzzle/ recurring encounter
sticker: emoji//1f3c1
---
Party enters a area surrounded by a large black stone wall (Mud if need natural)
5x6 grid pattern with recurring letters written in sylvan With a statue of an object with 6 letters stands. 
the goal is to step on the correct letters, for each letter that is correct reveal that information by the tile glowing with a good aura ect. 
For each incorect letter a bad aura and add to the amount of enemies in the end
Could be like 1d3 minor animated objects per incorrect sigil  with hardness 5

# I can see this one being difficult and annoying it might make sense to have some of the key to the puzzle on a wall or scrap of paper and any characters who know sylvan should be given an advantage to determining the language

When completed correctly this encounter should stop appearing and provide a minor but still impactful reward
